p.k: Robin tries to destroy some pesky mocking birds but they come back bigger, stronger, and ready to mock. / When Robin gets frustrated with the Titans' disobedience he turns to...puppets. / Robin's mask doesn't just conceal his secret identity it hides a terrible secret!/ The Titans throw a slumber party to help Cyborg get over his fear of Scary Teri. / Robin tries to teach The Titans to respect money but he ends up bee-ing the one who learns the lesson./Cyborg wants to have an 80s TV show marathon but the remote is missing.
